description: Environmentalists in the south of France find masks and gloves littering the seabed.
title: Coronavirus: French alarm at Covid-linked Med pollution
title_page: Coronavirus: French alarm at Covid-linked Med pollution - BBC News
maintext: The group's founder, Laurent Lombard, who shot the underwater footage and posted it on Facebook, says "these masks - we haven't had them for long, and we're going to have billions, so I say watch out, it's the beginnings of a new type of pollution".
